strapiSiteInfo.about:
Thanks for visiting! Don't be a stranger, feel free to reach out and say hello!
[jared@cjaredm.com](mailto:jared@cjaredm.com?subject=Just%20saw%20your%20portfolio%20site)

I am someone who takes things apart to see how each part works. I am a life-time learner with a Bachelor's degree in Philosophy and a Master's degree of Education in Instructional Design. I strive to learn how things work while also focusing on functionality and getting work done.

My passion is to create value in the world. I am rewarded when I see my work being used, appreciated and built upon. I one day wish to own my own SaaS company that provides tools for small businesses. I dream to hire and train young adults in software development and mentor others seeking the same rewarding career I already have.

nodes.title: Playing Games
nodes.synopsis: Bought a Raspberry Pi and things escalated from there. RetroPie, then RaspberryPi Zero built into an Xbox controller that connects directly to the TV with HDMI to play RetroPie like an Atari, and eventually CloneHero on my Mac.

nodes.title: Wordpress?
nodes.synopsis: CMS is important for clients, Wordpress isn't the best. Yada yada yada.

nodes.title: Coding Grit
nodes.synopsis:
Everyone: Whats the best way to learn to code? What should I learn first? I want to change careers to programming.
1 month later, Everyone: What's the best way learn the harmonica? I'm going to go onto America's Got Talent one day.
